segments.text: Is the environment a big issues in your country ? It is in mine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is in mine too.The biggest issue is water . The climate is dry and so water conservation is very important .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What methods do you use to conserve water ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Water is rationed . We can only use a certain amount each month . It means that we cannot use some modern household items , like washing machines . They use too much water .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . I think the biggest environment problem in my country is air pollution .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I agree . The air here is much more polluted than in my country . Of course , my country is more agricultural and has much less industry .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have reduced emission of air pollutants in recent years , but cars are still a major source of them . Factories have become cleaner as stricter environment pollution law have been introduced .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The problem is now on a truly global scale . I don ’ t believe that any single country can do anything about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think you ’ re right . There needs to be an international response to this problem .
segments.speaker: S1
